lead_paragraph: Mario Draghi, the European Central Bank president, is on the verge of executing mass purchases of government bonds. But he will need Berlin's blessing.
snippet: Mario Draghi, the European Central Bank president, is on the verge of executing mass purchases of government bonds. But he will need Berlin's blessing.

headline.main: All Eyes on Berlin as E.C.B. Readies Bond-Buying Program
headline.print_headline: All Eyes on Berlin as E.C.B. Readies Bond-Buying Program
